extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by CVE-2022-22954 or CVE-2022-22960 by retrieving the installed version of VMware products.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by CVE-2022-22954 or CVE-2022-22960?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply VMware Patches
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the patches provided by VMware to address CVE-2022-22954 and CVE-2022-22960 vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Review VMware Workarounds
extracted_playbook.description: Review and apply VMware's recommended workarounds if patching is not immediately possible.
